mohamad ismayil kriyakarayi.[6][9][10] wishwawidyalaya, pradhana pita hatharakin ha anekuth ansha/eekaka rasakin samanwitha we: wishwawidyala pitayan kalamanakarana ha wanijyaya pitaya kala ha sanskrutha pitaya islam adhyayanaya saha arabi bhasha pitaya anekuth ansha/eekaka ranga saha shrawanagaraya sanskruthika kauthukagaraya widyuth-iganum madhyasthanaya ingrisi bhasha iganwum eekakaya thorathuru thakshana madhyasthanaya thaththwa sahathikakarana eekakaya paryeshana saha salasum eekakaya shishya upadeshana eekakaya wishwawidyala newasika sankirnaya wyawaharika widya pitaya[sanskaranaya] wyawaharika widya pitaya pradhana ansha thunakin samanwitha weyi: jaiwiya widya anshaya, ganitha anshaya ha bhauthika widya anshaya.[11]
